sentence.Network_en: To Betty, Joe had an air of worldliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 在贝蒂看来，乔有点儿世故。

sentence.Network_en: Satan, sin, self, darkness, and worldliness predominate among all people on earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 撒但 、 罪 、 己 、 黑暗和属地事物,辖制了全地的人.

sentence.Network_en: But for all of its worldliness, this is a lovingly homemade album.
sentence.Network_cn: 总之,《光亮》是一张精致的原创专辑.

entry.def: Worldly is used to describe things relating to the ordinary activities of life, rather than to spiritual things.

example.ex: I think it is time you woke up and focused your thoughts on more worldly matters...
example.tran: 我认为是该你清醒过来把思想集中到更为现实的问题上的时候了。

example.ex: He has repeatedly criticized Western churches as too worldly and too entrenched in consumerism.
example.tran: 他一再批评西方教会过于世俗，消费主义观念过于顽固。

entry.def: Someone who is worldly is experienced and knows about the practical or social aspects of life.

example.ex: He was different from anyone I had known, very worldly, everything that Dermot was not...
example.tran: 他不同于我认识的任何一个人，非常老成，与德莫特完全相反。

entry.def: Worldly is used to describe things relating to success, wealth, and possessions.

example.ex: Today the media drive athletes to the view that the important thing is to gain worldly success.
example.tran: 现在，媒体使得运动员认为追名逐利是很重要的。

entry.def: You can refer to someone's possessions as their worldly goods or possessions.

example.ex: ...a man who had given up all his worldly goods...
example.tran: 放弃了所有财产的男子

example.ex: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
example.tran: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality or character of being intellectually sophisticated through cultivation or experience or disillusionment

auth_sentence.content: Baudelaire mocked me with his cynical worldliness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Baudelaire mocked me with his cynical worldliness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Baudelaire mocked me with his cynical worldliness.

auth_sentence.content: It was all new, an adventure that proved my own worldliness.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was all new, an adventure that proved my own worldliness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was all new, an adventure that proved my own worldliness.

auth_sentence.content: History teaches us that such other-worldliness usually only ends up in the collections of fans and bearded guys.
auth_sentence.res_content: History teaches us that such other-worldliness usually only ends up in the collections of fans and bearded guys.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: History teaches us that such other-worldliness usually only ends up in the collections of fans and bearded guys.
